attributes.name: Obsidian Edged Musket
attributes.description: "The dark black rock makes this a beautiful rifle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The dark black rock makes this a beautiful rifle."

attributes.name: Obsidian Rapier
attributes.description: "The obsidian is sharpened and tempered, a fine blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "The obsidian is sharpened and tempered, a fine blade."

attributes.name: Obsidian Reaver
attributes.description: "Volcanic in nature, this hatchet's detail is as fine as any."
attributes.parsed_description: "Volcanic in nature, this hatchet's detail is as fine as any."

attributes.name: Obsidian Shot
attributes.description: "Obsidian makes an excellent bullet. It ruptures as soon as it hits your target, inflicting more pain than you can imagine."
attributes.parsed_description: "Obsidian makes an excellent bullet. It ruptures as soon as it hits your target, inflicting more pain than you can imagine."

attributes.name: Obsidian Slasher
attributes.description: "Though many think obsidian to be brittle, a skilled smith can create the deadliest of weapons with it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Though many think obsidian to be brittle, a skilled smith can create the deadliest of weapons with it."

attributes.name: Obsidian Tipped Fire Staff
attributes.description: "The staff is attuned to the magma after being forged in the depths of a volcano."
attributes.parsed_description: "The staff is attuned to the magma after being forged in the depths of a volcano."

attributes.name: Obsidian Warhammer
attributes.description: "Volcanic eruptions provide a narrow window for forging weapons from the molten rock spewing out of the mountain."
attributes.parsed_description: "Volcanic eruptions provide a narrow window for forging weapons from the molten rock spewing out of the mountain."

attributes.name: Ode to the Fallen
attributes.description: "Remember and honor those who came before us."
attributes.parsed_description: "Remember and honor those who came before us."

attributes.name: Ogre's Hairtrimmer
attributes.description: "Just a little off the top."
attributes.parsed_description: "Just a little off the top."

attributes.name: Ogre's Headcrusher
attributes.description: "While the Ogres of Aeternum are deadly with just their bare hands, once they have a weapon they are truly a sight to fear."
attributes.parsed_description: "While the Ogres of Aeternum are deadly with just their bare hands, once they have a weapon they are truly a sight to fear."

attributes.name: Olcott Cutter
attributes.description: "Originally used for hunting animals, over time it became something that struck fear into the hearts of people and animals alike."
attributes.parsed_description: "Originally used for hunting animals, over time it became something that struck fear into the hearts of people and animals alike."

attributes.name: Omen
attributes.description: "What fate awaits you?"
attributes.parsed_description: "What fate awaits you?"

attributes.name: Ona'thul
attributes.description: "Blessed hatchet of the Corrupted priests."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blessed hatchet of the Corrupted priests."

attributes.name: One Last Breath
attributes.description: "Is this how they will remember you sputtering and gasping for air?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Is this how they will remember you sputtering and gasping for air?"

attributes.name: On Wings of Song
attributes.description: "Fly free, far, and true. Let these notes carry you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fly free, far, and true. Let these notes carry you."

attributes.name: Open Hand
attributes.description: "When others come to you, offer them protection and relief with what power you have."
attributes.parsed_description: "When others come to you, offer them protection and relief with what power you have."
